channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Administration again denies FEMA disaster relief for Illinois, Pritzker says
item.description: Officials in jurisdictions led by Democrats have viewed the denials of aid as politically driven.

item.title: Inside Trump and Mamdani's surprising bond of convenience
item.description: For all the hype of a conflict, President Trump and New York City's next mayor, Zohran Mamdani , had a surprising bond when they met Friday in the Ova...

item.title: PBS to air Lily Gladstone–narrated film on Blackfeet buffalo return after decades-long fight
item.description: A new documentary narrated and executive-produced by Lily Gladstone , Oscar-nominated star of "Killers of the Flower Moon," tackles the Blackfeet Nati...

item.title: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene resigning from Congress
item.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene is resigning from Congress after her acrimonious split with President Trump, the Georgia Republican announced in a post on...

item.title: Fractious UN climate talks end with no direct push on fossil fuels in deal
item.description: UN climate talks in Brazil are wrapping up Saturday with a push to help move nations away from fossil fuels, but the deal lacks explicit mention of th...

item.title: U.S. to hold talks in Geneva with Ukraine and EU countries on Trump's peace plan
item.description: The U.S., Ukraine, Germany, France and the UK are expected to hold negotiations on Sunday in Geneva over the new U.S. peace plan , according to two U....

item.title: Pentagon urges inquiry of Trump foe Vindman over Ukraine work
item.description: The Pentagon is urging the House to investigate whether Rep. Eugene Vindman (D-Virginia) improperly consulted on behalf of Ukraine — a claim he denies...

item.title: What Trump and Mamdani have said about each other — then and now
item.description: President Donald Trump’s Friday Oval office meeting with New York Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani shocked many for its civility. They had traded insults an...

item.title: Justice Dept. again asks for Epstein grand jury testimony to be unsealed
item.description: The move is the first step the department has taken since Congress compelled the release of more files, though Trump could direct the release of such ...

item.title: It’s called the ‘six-year itch.’ Democrats hope it favors them for the Senate.
item.description: The sixth year of a presidency typically produces brutal results for his party in Senate races, but everything about Trump is unconventional.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
